WGBH WGBH Educational Foundation
All the powers of the corporation are to be
exercised and its purposes are to be accomplished
by a Board of Trustees, who are the persons from tim
to time hold the following offices:
Trustee of Lowell Institute
President of Harvard College
President of Massachusetts Institute of
Technology
Treasurer of Harvard College
Treasurer of Massachusetts Institute of
Technology
President of the Trustees of the Boston
Symphony Orchestra
Director of the Lowell Institute Cooperative
Broadcasting Council
